EmailTemplate.name: 21_CustomerSuccess_Wahlberg_Email.Email 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Mark Wahlberg stays connected with Honeywell Forge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Being out of touch – even for a couple of hours – is not an option for Mark Wahlberg.
The world-renowned actor, producer, entrepreneur and family man stays constantly connected when he flies in his business jet thanks to Honeywell’s best JetWave satellite communications system and our signature Honeywell Forge cabin connectivity solution.
Click here <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/XH8nEqVLp2pCKH7czRHhGo?]]> to see how Mark stays in touch, wherever his busy live takes him.
